subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Yauheni Hutarovich surged ahead of Mark Cavendish and Tyler Farrar to win the second stage of the Vuelta a España, taking the sprint finish in 4 hours 35 minutes 41 seconds.
snippet: Yauheni Hutarovich surged ahead of Mark Cavendish and Tyler Farrar to win the second stage of the Vuelta a España, taking the sprint finish in 4 hours 35 minutes 41 seconds.
